Class BoardModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • BoardModel

  • public class BoardModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will be used to represent a model to be used with the controller and view(fxml file) of this application. The model's main purpose is to store the data which is given by the user to the view, and converted by the controller. It will store info on the types of players being used and the info of the game being played.
    Author:
    Teagen Kiel
